lines.text: What do you boys think of me, anyway?
We think you're a perfect... lady.

[Laughing]
Well, if you do, you're crazy.

I know what you think, and you're right. I'm a '23 model with a '33 paint job. I'm running a honky-tonk, and I've run lots worse ones than this. When I was young, I got what I wanted by loving; now that I'm old I get what I want by fighting.

[the phone rings, and a blonde in a flimsy negligee enters to answer it]
I hope this is business! Hello?

This is Dill... Yes. Have you got a good-looking girl for two or three days to entertain a friend of Mr. Conway's from out of town?... No, I don't know whether he likes blondes or brunettes. But get someone snappy who won't scare him to death. In other words, a lady... OK, send me the bill.
Snap into it, you're going to work.
